title: Sewage Treatment
desc:
Rent:
- If one property in the Utilities set is owned, then rent is 4 times the amount shown on the die.
- If both properties in the Utilities set is owned, then rent is 10 times the amount shown on the die.

Drive-By:
Get covered in Sewage. If you are not the owner, half the amount that you have left to move, and next time you roll to move, only roll one die.
